description: Learn the basic tying techniques that are the foundation elements of Shibari: Japanese rope bondage. Popular bondage artists and expert presenters Kanso and True Blue, from Bondage Erotique, deliver this essential introduction to the world's most popular form of bondage. This video shares the core concepts of Shibari, rope handling, the safety factors involved, and step-by-step demonstration of single and double column ties for beautifully restraining one or two arms or legs, plus some dynamic variations.Photos for this tutorial include a set with step-by-step captions.
title: Shibari 101 - Basic Column Ties
